00001 #include "LookupTable.h"
00002 #include <iostream>
00003 using namespace std;

00010 LookupTable::LookupTable(set<char> S) {
00011   for (int k=0;k<26;k++) {
00012     char2index[k] = -1;  // all invalid
00013   }
00014   n = S.size();
00015   set<char>::iterator si;
00016   int k = 0;
00017   for (si = S.begin(); si != S.end(); ++si) {
00018     char ch = *si;
00019     char2index[ch - 'a'] = k;
00020     k++;
00021   }
00022 }
00023 
00024 void LookupTable::set_values(unsigned long x) {
00025   for (int k=0; k<n; k++) {
00026     unsigned long mask = 1<<k;
00027     values[k] = (x&mask) != 0;
00028   }
00029 }
00030 
00031 bool LookupTable::lookup(char ch) const {
00032   int idx = char2index[ch - 'a'];
00033   if (idx < 0) {
00034     cerr << "This shouldn't happen (lookup invalid variable)" << endl;
00035     return false;
00036   }
00037   return values[idx];
00038 }
00039 
00040 // DEBUG ROUTINE //
00041 void LookupTable::dump() const {
00042   for(int k=0; k<26; k++) {
00043     char ch = 'a' + k;
00044     int idx = char2index[k];
00045     if (idx >= 0) {
00046       cerr << ch << " -> " << values[idx] << endl;
00047     }
00048   }
00049 }
